title: Avery Jeggings
body_html:
Amethyst Jeans Avery Jegging. Traditional five pocket styling with button flap back pockets. Embroidery details at pockets. Zip fly. Button waist.

Fabrication:
73% Cotton, 22% Polyester, 3% Rayon, 2% Spandex.
Made in China.

Care:
Machine wash cold with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Warm iron if necessary.

Model:
Morgan is wearing the Avery Jegging in a size 14.
tags: blue, Collection.Denim, DDENIM, DENIM, department:Bottoms, Essential, Full, MEMDAY, ShowOnBluefly, ShowOnHG, ShowOnMPS, Under$100, {size:16}, {size:18}, {size:20}
